title: 5 Essential Steps to Take When You Receive Your Paycheck
subtitle: Learn the key financial strategies to maximize your paycheck and achieve financial health, from budgeting to investing wisely.
content:
5 Essential Steps to Take When You Receive Your Paycheck

I'm Tyler. I'm a former financial advisor and portfolio manager. Now I make financial content for free so that you don't have to pay for it.

1. Calculate Your Monthly Living Expenses

Calculate exactly what you expect to live on each month. If that's over 60% of your paycheck, you're living beyond your means. And I've got bad news. It's time to downgrade.

2. Pay Down High-Interest Debt

Take 10% of that paycheck and pay down any high interest debt. Because there is no better way to stay broke than to be fighting an uphill battle against 35% interest rates.

3. Set Aside Fun Money

Take 10% of that paycheck and do whatever the heck you want with it. If it's not fun, it's not going to be sustainable.

4. Invest Wisely

In that remaining 10%, invest, invest, invest! Low cost, diversified index funds equal the only tried and true way to stop living paycheck to paycheck.

If any of this is helpful, like and follow, and I'll keep trying to get you one step closer to where you need to be.
